resources.string:
Body Index Mass (BMI) is a measure of body.
fat based on height and weight that
applies to adult men and women. View the BMI tables or use the tool below to
Formula: weight (lb) / [height (in)]2 x 703
Then, calculate BMI by dividing weight in pounds (lb)
by height in inches (in) squared and multiplying by a conversion factor of 703.
